mapper.insert: INSERT INTO path( path, updated_id, updated_datetime ) VALUES( #{path}, #{updatedId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.path, GROUP_CONCAT(b.license_plate) AS bus, GROUP_CONCAT(b.id) AS busIds FROM path p LEFT JOIN path_bus pb ON p.id = pb.path_id LEFT JOIN bus b ON b.id = pb.bus_id GROUP BY p.id, p.path
